legacy.description: Ready to embrace the Luohu Style? Follow the steps to experience the vibrant life in Luohu, Shenzhen!
legacy.name: Luohu Style

result.text:
🤩Would you like to take a break in the vibrant city of #Shenzhen? 
🌊Silver Lake in #Luohu is a great option. It's nestled amidst lush mountains and clear waters, and has witnessed Luohu's growth and development. 🤲Taking a leisurely stroll around the lake is sure to rejuvenate you. 
👉Join us for a city walk! #TourLuohu #GreenLuohu

legacy.description: Futian district of Shenzhen, China is a hub of innovation, culture and commerce. Follow us now!
legacy.name: I Love Futian

result.text:
🤩Would you like to embrace #Futian's mountain views this autumn? Follow us! 
⛰️From the elevated vantage point of #Lianhuashan Park, you can enjoy the panoramic beauty of Futian CBD. 🌲🌳Not far from the city center, #Bijiashan Park offers vistas of both #Shenzhen's new cityscape and its old blocks. For those seeking tranquility, #Meilinshan Park is the ultimate retreat.  🤲Join us for more great views in Futian! 

#HappyFutian #GreenFutian @SceneryofChina @sz_mediagroup @szdaily1

legacy.full_text: Located in Weining county, #Guizhou province, #Caohai is renowned as the “Plateau Pearl” of Guizhou. legacy.full_text: China is the earliest country to use bamboo products. Originated in the Six Dynasties period (222-589), bamboo carving became a specialized form of carving art during the Ming and Qing Dynasties dynasties (1368-1911). It is also a national-level intangible cultural heritage. https://t.co/7bmgrN9XBH
